title: By the King. A proclamation commanding conformity to his Maiesties pleasure, expressed in his late charter to the tobacco-pipe-makers
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
publisher: By Robert Barker, and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,
notes: Dated at end: Theobalds the seuen and twentieth day of May, in the eighteenth yeere of our reigne ..
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
